name: DailySignal
text:
RT @AmySwearer: Charging Derek Chaugin with third-degree murder is a bizzare choice. It's a charge for which, as a matter of law, he cannot be convicted. And it's downright puzzling that prosecutors are pursuing it over other available options.

https://t.co/FZwEppyvDH via @DailySignal

name: DailySignal
text:
When government programs “take care of us,” they kill off some of the best of life and make us much less productive.

A sobering must-read from @JohnStossel: https://t.co/uMmaDCBmIr

name: DailySignal
text:
